body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

 /kind bug

**What happened**:
Executing the 'kubectl apply -f XXXX.yaml'
The error message can not show the apiVersion info correctly when I give a not exist kind(version+kind):

~# kubectl apply -f kind-no-match.yaml 
error: unable to recognize "kind-no-match.yaml": no matches for **scheduling.io/**, Kind=PriorityPreemptionClass

~# kubectl apply -f kind-no-match-no-group.yaml 
error: unable to recognize "kind-no-match-no-group.yaml": no matches for /, Kind=PriorityClass


**What you expected to happen**:
I hope the message shown like this:

~# kubectl apply -f kind-no-match.yaml 
error: unable to recognize "kind-no-match.yaml": no matches for **scheduling.io/v1alpha**, Kind=PriorityPreemptionClass

~# kubectl apply -f kind-no-match-no-group.yaml 
error: unable to recognize "kind-no-match-no-group.yaml": no matches for **v1**, Kind=PriorityClass


**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
kind-no-match.yaml 
```
apiVersion: scheduling.io/v1alpha 
kind: PriorityPreemptionClass
metadata:
  name: high-priority
value: 1000
globalDefault: false
description: "This priority class should be used for higher level app."
```
kind-no-match-no-group.yaml 
```
apiVersion: v1 
kind: PriorityClass
metadata:
  name: high-priority
value: 1000
globalDefault: false
description: "This priority class should be used for higher level app."
```

**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
~# kubectl version
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"9+", GitVersion:"v1.9.0-alpha.2.210+9c962f6d1cb86d", GitCommit:"9c962f6d1cb86d18aac4ba0fe1062274318d7d19", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-11-06T11:39:23Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"9+", GitVersion:"v1.9.0-alpha.2.210+9c962f6d1cb86d", GitCommit:"9c962f6d1cb86d18aac4ba0fe1062274318d7d19", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-11-06T11:21:47Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
hardware
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
CentOS Linux release 7.3.1611 (Core)
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
Linux host-10-10-10-97 3.10.0-514.26.2.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Jul 18 11:25:45 CST 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
- Install tools:
- Others:

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG API Machinery.
labels.name: sig/api-machinery

title: Can not print the apiVersion info when failed to execute kubectl apply -f XXX.yaml
